sect3.title: Drawing rectangles
sect3.para: Drawing fill rectangle to page is easy with this mode. User first set on toolbars and menu which can use. Then only click left button and drag new fill rectangle on the page. For information is in draging viewed rectangle. The viewed part of the page is refreshing after each added rectangle.
If user doesn't end of adding new rectangle, can press Esc key befor release of left button.
